attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an unfair tax as these car's take up no more room on the road and we already pay tax on the fuel that we use. Considering a road tax of £1500 - £2000 per year is outrageous.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "4x4 Road Tax."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11805.asp

Prime Minister's Office
